definitions.title: n.pr. 1. m.
definitions.body: an Amorite, brother of Mamre, dwelling in neighbourhood of Hebron Ge 14:13, Ge 14:24.

in combination [[נַחַל אֶשְׁכּׂל]] Nu 13:23, De 1:24; [[אֶשְׁכּוֹל]] ´[[נ]] Nu 13:24, Nu 32:9; —valley of Eshcol, = valley of a cluster, region of Hebron (cf. Nu 13:22); in Nu 13:24 der. fr. ´[[א]] cluster, q. v.; see however Di ad loc.
